00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_SUB_CSV_ER_2010_HPP

00012 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/copy.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/type_traits/container/value.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/assign/v2/put/sub/make.hpp>
00016 
00017 namespace boost{
00018 namespace assign{
00019 namespace v2{
00020 namespace csv_put_aux{
00021 
00022     template<typename V> 
00023     class sub 
00024         : protected ref::wrapper< 
00025                 ref::assign_tag::copy,
00026             V
00027         >
00028     {
00029 
00030                 protected:
00031 
00032                 typedef ref::assign_tag::copy assign_tag_;
00033                 typedef ref::wrapper<assign_tag_,V> super1_t;
00034 
00035                 typedef typename v2::container_type_traits::value<V>::type value_type;
00036 
00037                 public:
00038 
00039                 sub(){}
00040                 explicit sub( V& v ) : super1_t( v ) {}
00041 
00042 #define MACRO1(z, i, data) ( BOOST_PP_CAT(_, i) )
00043 #define MACRO2(z, N, data)\
00044     typename result_of::put<V>::type\
00045     operator()( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, value_type const & _) )\
00046     {\
00047         return put( this->unwrap() ) BOOST_PP_REPEAT(N, MACRO1, ~ );\
00048     }\
00049 
00050 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(
00051         1, 
00052     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_CSV_ARITY),
00053     MACRO2,
00054     ~
00055 )
00056 #undef MACRO1
00057 #undef MACRO2           
00058 
00059                 V& unwrap()const{ 
00060                 return static_cast<super1_t const&>(*this).unwrap(); 
00061         }
00062 
00063     };
00064 
00065 }// csv_put_aux
00066 namespace result_of{
00067 
00068         template<typename V>
00069     struct csv_put
00070     {
00071                 typedef csv_put_aux::sub<V> type;
00072         };
00073     
00074 }// result_of
00075 
00076         template<typename V>
00077         typename result_of::csv_put<V>::type
00078         csv_put( V& v )
00079     {
00080                 typedef typename result_of::csv_put<V>::type result_;
00081         return result_( v );
00082     }

00084 }// v2
00085 }// assign
